title: Bachelor of Islamic Studies
description: The Bachelor of Islamic Studies is a four-year program that provides students with a comprehensive understanding of Islamic studies. It is designed to prepare students for a career in the field of Islamic studies.

title: Master of Islamic Studies
description: The Master of Islamic Studies is a two-year program that provides students with a comprehensive understanding of Islamic studies. It is designed to prepare students for a career in the field of Islamic studies.

title: PhD in Islamic Studies
description: The PhD in Islamic Studies is a three- to five-year program that provides students with a comprehensive understanding of Islamic studies. It is designed to prepare students for a career in the field of Islamic studies.
